title: Iowa man admits to exposing himself to a woman in a store
text:
Nicholas Sheehy, 23, was arrested Friday at a Dollar General in Ottumwa, Iowa (pictured in his mugshot)

An Iowa man who flashed a woman told cops that he 'had seen someone do it in a pornographic film'.

Nicholas Sheehy, 23, was arrested Friday afternoon at a Dollar General in Ottumwa after he exposed himself to a woman and her young son.

When he was confronted by police, Sheehy 'admitted that he ''whipped it out'' referring to his penis,' according to a criminal complaint.

'The defendant stated that he had seen someone do it in a pornographic film and believed that the female patron may respond to it sexually,' the complaint said.

But the only response the woman had was to call the cops who then arrested him.

Sheehy told police that he 'whipped it out' because he saw 'someone do it in a pornographic film' and believed that she would 'respond to it sexually'. It happened at this Dollar General

Sheehy has been charged with indecent exposure, a serious misdemeanor.

He also admitted that he exposed himself for 'sexual gratification'.

Sheehy was booked into the Wapello County jail and released after posting $1,000 bond.

On Tuesday, Sheehy made his initial court appearance.

He is scheduled for a preliminary hearing on October 31.
description: Nicholas Sheehy, 23, was arrested Friday at a Dollar General in Ottumwa, Iowa, after admitting  to police that he exposed himself to woman and her young son.
